text:
Motherhood looks good on Mindy Kaling!

The new mom made her first public appearance on Thursday when she joined her A Wrinkle in Time co-stars -- Oprah Winfrey, Reese Witherspoon and Storm Reid -- at Disneyland in Anaheim, California.

Kaling, 38, looked slim and stunning in a polka dot dress and strappy heels that went well with her mouse ears. The Mindy Project star clearly had a great time with her co-stars at the happiest place on Earth as she posted several pics on Instagram.

"Mindy Mouse," she captioned one of the images.

14 PHOTOS Mindy Kaling in 2018 See Gallery Mindy Kaling in 2018 LOS ANGELES, CA - FEBRUARY 26: Mindy Kaling attends Premiere Of Disney's 'A Wrinkle In Time' - Arrivals on February 26, 2018 in Los Angeles, California. (Photo by Presley Ann/Patrick McMullan via Getty Images) LOS ANGELES, CA - FEBRUARY 26: Mindy Kaling arrives at the Los Angeles premiere of Disney's 'A Wrinkle In Time' held at El Capitan Theatre on February 26, 2018 in Los Angeles, California. (Photo by Michael Tran/FilmMagic) LOS ANGELES, CA - FEBRUARY 26: Actor Mindy Kaling (L) and B. J. Novak at the world premiere of Disneyï¿½s 'A Wrinkle in Time' at the El Capitan Theatre in Hollywood CA, March 26, 2018. (Photo by Alberto E. Rodriguez/Getty Images for Disney) LOS ANGELES, CA - FEBRUARY 26: (L-R) Oprah Winfrey, Storm Reid, Reese Witherspoon and Mindy Kaling attend the premiere of Disney's 'A Wrinkle In Time' at the El Capitan Theatre on February 26, 2018 in Los Angeles, California. (Photo by Kevin Winter/Getty Images) HOLLYWOOD, CA - FEBRUARY 25: Actor Mindy Kaling participates in the press conference for Disneyï¿½s 'A Wrinkle in Time' in Hollywood, CA on March 25, 2018 (Photo by Alberto E. Rodriguez/Getty Images for Disney) ANAHEIM, CA - FEBRUARY 22: In this handout photo provided by Disney Resort, actresses Mindy Kaling, Oprah Winfrey, Storm Reid and Reese Witherspoon visited the Disneyland Resort on February 22, 2018 in Anaheim, California.ï¿½ The stars of Disneys upcoming film, 'A Wrinkle in Time,' gathered together in front of Sleeping Beauty Castle in Disneyland Park.ï¿½ 'A Wrinkle in Time' opens in theaters nationwide March 9, 2018.ï¿½(Photo by Todd Wawrychuk/Disneyland Resort via Getty Images) ANAHEIM, CA - FEBRUARY 22: In this handout photo provided by Disney Resort, the stars of Disney's upcoming film, 'A Wrinkle in Time,' visited the Disneyland Resort on February 22, 2018 in Anaheim, California. Actresses Mindy Kaling, Reese Witherspoon, Storm Reid and Oprah Winfrey surprised guests at the Sunset Showcase Theater in Disney California Adventure Park with a special appearance after a preview of the film was shown. 'A Wrinkle in Time' opens in theaters nationwide March 9, 2018. (Photo byTodd Wawrychuk/Disneyland Resort via Getty Images) 🌟👯‍♀️🐭 @reesewitherspoon! Boomerang by my love @mollyrstern Mindy Mouse Magic Kingdom with my Mrses and Meg ❤️ @disneyland. Miss you @ava No makeup no filter mom night out with @juliaspowellart ❤️✨👯‍♀️✨❤️ Back at work with my girls @asekar95 and @yo_its_hmo. It cold! Baby couture care of @salvadorperezcostumes. I can’t even with this Mindy Lahiri mini me dress. ❤️🙌🏾❤️🙌🏾 ANAHEIM, CA - FEBRUARY 22: In this handout photo provided by Disney Resort, the stars of Disney's upcoming film, 'A Wrinkle in Time,' visited the Disneyland Resort on February 22, 2018 in Anaheim, California. Actresses Oprah Winfrey, Reese Witherspoon, Mindy Kaling and Storm Reid surprised guests at the Sunset Showcase Theater in Disney California Adventure Park with a special appearance after a preview of the film was shown. 'A Wrinkle in Time' opens in theaters nationwide March 9, 2018. (Photo by Joshua Sudock/Disneyland Resort via Getty Images) Up Next See Gallery Discover More Like This HIDE CAPTION SHOW CAPTION of SEE ALL BACK TO SLIDE

Kaling gave birth to daughter Katherine in December and in the birth certificate obtained by ET, she did not list her baby's father's name.

The birth certificate does list Katherine's birthday as Dec. 15, and in a sweet tribute to Kaling's late mother, Swati Roysircar, she decided to give her daughter the middle name Swati.

A Wrinkle in Time hits theaters on March 9.
title: Mindy Kaling makes first post-baby appearance at Disneyland with her 'Wrinkle in Time' co-stars
